import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Video, Menu, Shield } from 'lucide-react'; const Header = ({ user, onLogout, onAdminLogin, className = '' }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
navigate('/')} className="cursor-pointer inline-flex items-center gap-2" title="Home" >
VideoChat
Connect instantly
{user ? ( <> ) : ( <> )}
); }; export default Header;
